Jun Wu

Google Scholar / Github

Research Topics
  • Maximal Clique
  • Vertex Cover
  • Dominating Set
  • Diversified Top-k Clique

I have broad interest in artificial intelligence and its applications. My research is concerned with the practical resolution of NP-hard problems, including Boolean Satisfiability problem, Minimum Vertex Cover Problem, Maximum Satisfiability Problem, Maximum (Weight) Clique Problem, Graph Coloring Problem. I am particularly interested in the combinatorial problem with the heuristic algorithm and exact algorithm.

Educations

  • September 2010 - July 2014: B.Sc in computer science and technology, Jilin University, China
  • September 2015 - July 2017: M.Sc in computer science and technology, Northeast Normal University, China
  • October 2018 - October 2019: Visiting Ph.D. in University of Picardie Jules Verne, France
  • September 2017 - Now: Ph.D in information science and technology, Northeast Normal University, China
